name: Hitachi Corporate Office, Europe
goal:
Hitachi, Ltd., headquartered in Tokyo, Japan, delivers innovations that answer society’s challenges. The company’s consolidated revenues for fiscal 2015 (ended March 31, 2016) totaled 10,034.3 billion yen. The Hitachi Group is a global leader in the Social Innovation Business, and it has approximately 335,000 employees worldwide. Through collaborative creation, Hitachi is providing solutions to customers in a broad range of sectors, including Power / Energy, Industry / Distribution / Water, Urban Development, and Finance / Government & Public / Healthcare.

For more information on Hitachi, please visit the company's website at http://www.hitachi.com.
interests: Climate Action, Competition, Consumer Affairs, Customs, Economic and Financial Affairs, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Enlargement, Enterprise, Environment, External Relations, Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, Home Affairs, Information Society, Internal Market, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Public Health, Regional Policy, Research and Technology, Trade, Trans-European Networks, Transport
euInitiatives:
Emission limits & type-approval for internal combustion engines for non-road mobile machinery (NRMM)
Product Safety and Market Surveillance Package
Harmonisation of Road Safety requirements
Revision of the Outdoor Noise Directive
EU General Data Protection Regulation
Electyricity Market Design
DSM
